name: Mr. White (itch)
description:
Gameplay:

There you need to survive 6 Waves and defeat Boss. This sounds very easy but difficult is:

  • Small battleground
  • You has only 5 HP
  • Health and Ammo Drops random
  • Enemy spawn in random position
  • Boss has 100 HP and he spawn all enemy's'
  • and much more

Story:

  You have to play as a character named Mr white. Mr white is a member of the Saints’ clan. The Saints defend the universe from the "Hand of Darkness" clan.

 

  One day when Mr. White returned home after a long journey, he saw that the hand of darkness had succeeded in its plans to destroy the village of Saints. after that the darkness began to spread and a plague was born which destroys all living things. and only MR white can save the entire universe.

 

Features:

  • Simple but not easy
  • Retro style with special visual effect.
  • Four types of enemies (Melee, Ranged, Summoner and Boss)
  • Four Different weapons 
  • 25% random drop for each enemy (ammo or health pack)
